meta.description: Determine the optimal number of tanks of each type of crude oil to process to maximize net revenue given compound constraints.

params.name: revenue
params.description: Net revenue per tank of each type of oil

params.name: compound_A
params.description: Units of compound A required per tank of each type of oil

params.name: compound_B
params.description: Units of compound B required per tank of each type of oil

params.name: available_A
params.description: Total available units of compound A

params.name: available_B
params.description: Total available units of compound B

vars.name: tanks
vars.description: Number of tanks to process for each type of oil

objective.name: max_net_revenue
objective.expr: sum(revenue[o] * tanks[o] for o in OILS)
objective.description: Maximize the total net revenue from processing tanks of oil

constraints.name: compound_A_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(compound_A[o] * tanks[o] for o in OILS)
constraints.description: Total usage of compound A must not exceed available units

constraints.name: compound_B_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(compound_B[o] * tanks[o] for o in OILS)
constraints.description: Total usage of compound B must not exceed available units
